about_the_game:
Become an elite hacker in a thought-provoking cyberpunk world. Freelance for contracts, dive into target networks, breach their security, and build up both your reputation and equipment to succeed in the final life-changing run in time!

Breach the barriers, exploit the weaknesses, evade the traces, and reach your mission target. Every procedurally-generated network challenges your logical thinking and resourcefulness and sometimes also your decisiveness and competence under time pressure.

Shop for better components for your machine, meet your business contacts in boutique bars, earn money in side hustles, buy a miniature pink mutant spider, or just have a drink on the rooftop and watch the skyline with the other desperate misfits, figuring out your next move.

Play as a different netspectre in every playthrough, discovering more more about both the gameplay mechanics and the Netspectre original universe each time. Learn to adapt to the requirements of the different contracts, advantages of the different tools at your disposal, and special narrative opportunities presented to you in every playthrough.

Netspectre is in development; wishlist it here and join the Discord to stay in touch!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains references to mild violence, illicit substances, and other mature topics.
